column2: biostudent, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was taking lithium orotate and experience promising results to the extremes of my moods. Then, I decided to try this different compound of lithium.  Immediately it caused great anxiety. I think i might be beneficial for other patients, besides bipolar disorder, but for me the lithium orotate compound works the best.

column2: shione, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month
column9: I have been taking 1 5mg in the morning,I started out taking 1 in the morning and 1 at night but it made me dream too much and kept me from a sound sleep. I do get head aches, but have found that if I take an asprin I am fine. I am taking it to help with brain fog,and I think it is working i will wait till I have finished the bottle,but so far I do feel more alert.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: it gave me a headache and made me feel as if i was going braindead. a week after using it i no longer wanted to leave my house and was extremely nervous about everything. this stuff is dangerous, probably because it's bound to an aspartate ion (which is a neurotoxin) or whatever, but it's very reactive with the brain and feels as if someone is tickling the brain. don't take it and don't trust the TAHOMA CLINIC. They'll tell you no one has ever complained about feeling bad from taking lithium aspartate or orotate... trust me thay have. that person is me. i aslo have a friend who called and complained.
